content:
Museum Camp
Released7 September 2017 (Update)
MembersYes
LocationFossil Island
Map
Advanced data
Typesettlement

The Museum Camp is a location on Fossil Island. The Varrock Museum expedition resides here.

After arriving on Fossil Island via the canal barge, the player will be just west of the Museum Camp. At first, the camp will not be very useful, but players can utilise their Construction skill to build improvements within the camp.

Contents

  • 1 Building the camp
    • 1.1 Rewards
  • 2 Soil digging
  • 3 Personalities
  • 4 Trivia

Building the camp[edit | edit source]

In total, players will need the following items to build everything (28 slots, i.e. one full inventory):

  • 1 hammer (required for all facilities)
  • 10 oak planks
  • 2 iron bars
  • 25 nails
  • 1 tinderbox
  • 2 logs
  • 3 soft clay
  • 1 bucket
  • 2 ropes
  • 5 planks
Utility Level Materials Experience
Fossil cleaning station 5 5 planks, 5 nails 100
Bank chest 21 2 oak planks, an iron bar, 5 nails 250
Well 22 2 oak planks, bucket, rope, 5 nails 500
Cooking pot 24 2 logs, tinderbox, iron bar, 3 soft clay 800
Spinning wheel 28 4 oak planks, 5 nails 1,000
Loom 29 2 oak planks, 5 nails, 1 rope 1,000

Rewards[edit | edit source]

After building every camp improvement, players can speak to Peter just west of the rowboat for a reward of five unidentified small fossils, which can be stored in the nearby fossil storage crate. Along with 50 Mining and 150 kudos, claiming the reward from Peter is required to enter the Volcanic Mine.

Soil digging[edit | edit source]

Main article: Soil ยง Fossil Island

Within the camp, players can also, with the help of tools such as the trowel, rock pick, specimen brush, leather gloves and boots (which can all be found in a crate next to the fossil cleaning bench), dig up numulites by using the tools on soil found in the archaeological digs all around the camp. Doing this grants 5 Mining experience per attempt.

Personalities[edit | edit source]

  • Charles
  • David
  • Dog
  • Fossil Collector
  • Jardric
  • John
  • John (archaeologist)
  • Mattimeo
  • Peter
  • Petrified Pete
  • Shop keeper (Fossil Island)

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • The Museum Camp contains one of the game's few toilets. Strangely, though there is not a Non-player character inside the outhouse, attempting to open the door will cause a man inside to yell Occupied! This is in contrast to the Hosidius Vinery outhouse which is occupied by Man (Hosidius Vinery toilet).

  • One of the few toilets in Gielinor, located on the north-west side of the camp.

The '''Museum Camp''' is a location on [[Fossil Island]]. The [[Varrock Museum]] expedition resides here.

After arriving on Fossil Island via the [[canal barge]], the player will be just west of the Museum Camp. At first, the camp will not be very useful, but players can utilise their [[Construction]] skill to build improvements within the camp.
==Building the camp==
In total, players will need the following items to build everything (28 slots, i.e. one full inventory):

{{Checklist|
*1 [[hammer]] '''(required for all facilities)'''
*10 [[oak planks]]
*2 [[iron bars]]
*25 [[nails]]
*1 [[tinderbox]]
*2 [[logs]]
*3 [[soft clay]]
*1 [[bucket]]
*2 [[rope]]s
*5 [[planks]]
}}

===Rewards===
After building every camp improvement, players can speak to [[Peter]] just west of the rowboat for a reward of five [[unidentified small fossil]]s, which can be stored in the nearby [[fossil storage crate]]. Along with 50 [[Mining]] and 150 [[kudos]], claiming the reward from Peter is required to enter the [[Volcanic Mine]].

==Soil digging==
{{Main|Soil#Fossil Island}}
Within the camp, players can also, with the help of tools such as the [[trowel]], [[rock pick]], [[specimen brush]], [[leather gloves]] and [[leather boots|boots]] (which can all be found in a crate next to the fossil cleaning bench), dig up [[numulite]]s by using the tools on soil found in the archaeological digs all around the camp. Doing this grants 5 [[Mining]] [[experience]] per attempt.

==Personalities==
*[[Charles (Fossil Island)|Charles]]
*[[David (Fossil Island)|David]]
*[[Dog (Museum Camp)|Dog]]
*[[Fossil Collector]]
*[[Jardric]]
*[[John]]
*[[John (Fossil Island)|John]] (archaeologist)
*[[Mattimeo]]

*[[Petrified Pete]]
*[[Shop keeper (Fossil Island)]]

==Trivia==
* The Museum Camp contains one of the game's few [[toilet|toilets]]. Strangely, though there is not a [[Non-player character]] inside the outhouse, attempting to open the door will cause a [[man]] inside to yell {{RSFont|Occupied!}} This is in contrast to the [[Hosidius]] [[Vinery]] outhouse which is occupied by [[Man (Hosidius Vinery toilet)]].
